translations: 没有经验的；未成熟的；未加调料的；未干的

sentences.sentence: Salad, which can now refer to an unseasoned pile of vegetables, also comes from the idea of 'salted.
sentences.translation: 色拉，现在指未加调味料的一堆蔬菜，也是来自“加了盐的”这层意思。

sentences.sentence: Among variables of change way efficiency of stock unseasoned issuance it is the Paramount external variable.
sentences.translation: 它是决定新股发行制度变迁效率的诸多变量因素中最重要的外生变量。

sentences.sentence: Whatever he may have done, he certainly deserves more than to be harangued by an unseasoned boy like yourself.
sentences.translation: 无论他做了什么，他肯定不该被一个像你那样的未经世事的孩子夸张地品头论足。
